Reviews.Title: “Two stars is way over rated... do they have negative stars?”

Reviews.Content: stayed 9 hotels 21 days price range europe expensive ones return send feel fair comment hotel similar standard compare dont stay reminded cheap backpacker hostel price paying staff friendly 31 floor reception heard arguments unhappy guests reception staff hear feel safe hotel door night husband left hotel moved prepaid stuck amenities except soap refill wall refilled days stayed mould shower easy clean cleaned mould toilet paper using shower sheets thread bare bedcover burnt cigarette stains breakfast nice breads cereal coffee breakfast staff housekeeping staff nice location actually walked train station plenty hotels try floor lino echo bad especially level reception stay reading review request floor reception wont sleep wink earplugs third nights beyond tired loved rome stars bad review am writing entire budget trip
